*The class format, schedule, number of graded assignments may change during the semester, depending on student needs. 

This seminar style class will conducted face to face. However, assignments/ homework, lesson resources and important class information will be provided on Google Classroom. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. Also BYOD to class- computer, tablet, or smartphone. Students will engage in active learning: working individually, in pairs, groups and as a whole class to discuss and examine global issues, develop cross-cultural awareness, and improve academic and language skills through end of unit presentations.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Outside of class:
- For all class periods you will be required to complete homework assignments. This will include reading/listening/shadowing (graded readers on Xreading or supplementary articles), vocabulary study using Quizlet, textbook assignments, listening assignments, writing (journal responses and presentation templates/scripts), and oral presentation preparation. Be sure to attempt these assignments as they reinforce language, skills and assess knowledge of content covered in class.
- Self study and independent study skills development is a large component of this course.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1~2 hours doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I'm happy to speak to you.
